objects.text:
• Premium Navy Blue Design
• Professional Sound Quality
• Memory Foam Ear Cushions
• 24+ Hours Battery Life
DOUBLE THE COMFORT, DOUBLE THE SOUND!

product_details.name: Elite Pro Comfort: Premium Navy Blue Wireless Headphones with Studio-Quality Sound
product_details.description:
• 💫 Premium Navy Blue Design with Luxurious Padding for Extended Comfort
• 🎧 Professional-Grade Sound Quality with Deep Bass Response
• ☁️ Ultra-Soft Memory Foam Ear Cushions for Hours of Comfortable Listening
• 🎵 Adjustable Headband with Ergonomic Fit
• 🔷 Sleek Modern Design with Matching Blue Frame and Cushions
• 📱 Compatible with All Bluetooth-Enabled Devices
• ⚡ Long-lasting Battery Life for Extended Use
• 🔊 Precision-engineered Drivers for Crystal Clear Audio
• 💪 Durable Construction with Premium Materials
• 🎮 Perfect for Gaming, Music, and Professional Audio Work

banner_details:
This modern promotional banner highlights a sleek and professional product layout for wireless headphones. The background is a grid-based layout segmented into four quadrants with dark navy tones and radiant blue shapes, providing a futuristic tech-style appearance. The banner features a combination of strong typographic headlines. `heading_1`, `heading_2`, and `subheading` introduce the product with bold and vibrant fonts, emphasizing the branding and comfort features. The image of the user wearing headphones (`product_image`) enhances authenticity and engagement. `description` lists standout benefits in bullet points. `offer` and `price` highlight key marketing propositions with vivid yellow accents, while the call-to-action (`cta`) is placed within a rounded blue rectangle (`cta_button_background`). `tagline` reinforces customer satisfaction. 

**Color Palette:**
- Navy Blue (#0D1D3A)
- Royal Blue (#4B6FE8)
- Light Steel Blue (#A3B1D9)
- Bright Yellow (#FFD700)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Deep Blue (#1A355A)
product_color: The product image features a young man wearing stylish blue over-ear headphones and a similarly toned blue sweatshirt, both standing out against a crisp white background. The dominant color is a deep, saturated indigo blue (Hex: #2F4F83) used in the headphones and clothing, giving a modern and tech-savvy vibe. The frames of the eyeglasses are a nearly matching navy tone (Hex: #3A4E92), maintaining uniformity. The white background (Hex: #FFFFFF) enhances the vibrancy of the blue tones. His skin tone (Hex: #F4CBA4) provides a warm contrast that draws attention to the face and smile. These colors blend smoothly, highlighting the product without distraction.
